An average conversation in a bullet hell game:

---

Player: What if we both switch places because of a bug?

Boss: I don't think the developer would screw on us like that. Also, that would be a nightmare. I like shooting projectiles at you anyways.

---


Have you ever wondered what it was like from the bosses perspective.

Well now you can.

public void SwitchPlayerAndBoss() { }  <- uh oh, oopsie that went in there by mistake!

---

Backstory:

I was planning to make a bullet hell game but lets say I had to code a bug in else I wouldn't be able to compete in the THEME category. So I just made a quick function switching the player and the boss; modified some code and it worked out pretty well.

---
Goal:
Your goal is to kill the player, no matter what...

Try to get the best time if you want. The faster you manage to kill the player the more challenging of a level you will be.

----

Anyway, that's it. It honestly turned out really well for me.

I coded, designed, and made all the art myself. Sound effects were designed in bxfr.

The battle music you hear in the background is 2k19 Battle Jam from Meganeko.

But yeah, enjoy the game!
